allow:
Bash(.gitignore << 'EOF'
# Dependencies
node_modules
.pnp
.pnp.js

# Testing
coverage

# Production
build
dist
.next
out

# Misc
.DS_Store
*.pem
.env*.local
.env

# Debug
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Turbo
.turbo

# IDE
.vscode
.idea
*.swp
*.swo

# TypeScript
*.tsbuildinfo
EOF)

Bash(.env.example << 'EOF'
# RobinPump Contract
ROBINPUMP_FACTORY_ADDRESS=
BASE_RPC_URL=https://mainnet.base.org
BASE_CHAIN_ID=8453

# API Keys
ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=
ALCHEMY_API_KEY=

# Database
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/valuestor
REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379

# Authentication
JWT_SECRET=

# Bot
PRIVATE_KEY=
EOF)

Bash(packages/shared/tsconfig.json << 'EOF'
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "module": "commonjs",
    "lib": ["ES2020"],
    "declaration": true,
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./src",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true
  },
  "include": ["src/**/*"],
  "exclude": ["node_modules", "dist"]
}
EOF)

# Valuestor TODO List

## ðŸ”´ CRITICAL - Do This First!

- [ ] **Find RobinPump Factory Address**
  - Visit https://robinpump.fun/create
  - Inspect network calls or check Basescan
  - Update `packages/contracts/src/addresses/base.ts`
  - This is REQUIRED for the bot to work!

## ðŸŸ¡ High Priority

### Backend \(`apps/backend`\)

- [ ] Set up Express server with TypeScript
- [ ] Implement PostgreSQL schema with Prisma
  - [ ] Users table
  - [ ] Valuestors table
  - [ ] Positions table
  - [ ] Trades table
  - [ ] Tokens cache table
- [ ] Create REST API endpoints:
  - [ ] POST /api/valuestors - Register new valuestor
  - [ ] GET /api/valuestors/:address - Get valuestor profile
  - [ ] PUT /api/valuestors/:address - Update values
  - [ ] GET /api/valuestors/:address/positions - Get positions
  - [ ] GET /api/valuestors/:address/trades - Get trade history
  - [ ] GET /api/tokens - List all tokens
  - [ ] GET /api/tokens/:address - Get token details
- [ ] Add JWT authentication
- [ ] Implement WebSocket server for real-time updates
- [ ] Set up Redis caching layer

### Frontend \(`apps/frontend`\)

- [ ] Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router
- [ ] Set up Tailwind CSS
- [ ] Integrate RainbowKit for wallet connection
- [ ] Build pages:
  - [ ] `/` - Landing page
  - [ ] `/create` - Token launch interface
  - [ ] `/register` - Valuestor registration
  - [ ] `/dashboard` - Portfolio dashboard
  - [ ] `/tokens` - Browse all tokens
  - [ ] `/tokens/:address` - Token detail page
  - [ ] `/settings` - Values configuration
- [ ] Build components:
  - [ ] ValuesForm - Configure investment values
  - [ ] TokenCard - Display token info
  - [ ] PositionCard - Show position details
  - [ ] TradeHistory - List past trades
  - [ ] Dashboard charts \(portfolio value, P&L, allocation\)
- [ ] Connect to backend API
- [ ] Add real-time updates via WebSocket

### Database \(`packages/db`\)

- [ ] Create Prisma schema
- [ ] Set up migrations
- [ ] Build repository pattern
- [ ] Add database utilities
- [ ] Implement caching layer

## ðŸŸ¢ Medium Priority

### Trader Improvements

- [ ] Add more sophisticated risk analysis
  - [ ] Creator wallet age check
  - [ ] Creator transaction history analysis
  - [ ] Token contract verification
  - [ ] Holder distribution analysis
- [ ] Implement portfolio management
  - [ ] Position tracking
  - [ ] Automatic rebalancing
  - [ ] Take profit logic
  - [ ] Stop loss logic
- [ ] Add notification system
  - [ ] Email notifications
  - [ ] Discord webhooks
  - [ ] Telegram bot
- [ ] Enhance AI prompts
  - [ ] Market sentiment analysis
  - [ ] Trend detection
  - [ ] Competition analysis

### Features

- [ ] Social features
  - [ ] Follow other valuestors
  - [ ] Copy trading
  - [ ] Leaderboard
- [ ] Analytics dashboard
  - [ ] Performance metrics
  - [ ] Risk-adjusted returns
  - [ ] Values alignment tracking
- [ ] Token creator tools
  - [ ] Token creation wizard
  - [ ] Marketing tools
  - [ ] Analytics for creators

## ðŸ”µ Low Priority / Nice to Have

- [ ] Mobile app \(React Native\)
- [ ] Browser extension
- [ ] Advanced charting
- [ ] Custom trading strategies builder
- [ ] Machine learning for trend prediction
- [ ] Integration with other platforms
- [ ] Referral program
- [ ] Governance token

## ðŸ› ï¸ Technical Debt

- [ ] Add comprehensive tests
  - [ ] Unit tests for AI engine
  - [ ] Integration tests for trader
  - [ ] E2E tests for frontend
- [ ] Improve error handling
- [ ] Add retry logic for failed trades
- [ ] Implement circuit breakers
- [ ] Add rate limiting
- [ ] Optimize database queries
- [ ] Add monitoring and alerting
- [ ] Set up CI/CD pipeline
- [ ] Write API documentation
- [ ] Add code comments

## ðŸ“š Documentation

- [ ] API documentation \(OpenAPI/Swagger\)
- [ ] User guide

- [ ] Architecture diagrams
- [ ] Deployment guide
- [ ] Security best practices

## ðŸ” Security

## ðŸš€ Deployment

- [ ] Set up monitoring \(DataDog/New Relic\)

**Legend:**
- ðŸ”´ Critical - Must do immediately
- ðŸŸ¡ High Priority - Do soon

- ðŸ”µ Low Priority - Nice to have

{
  "name": "@valuestor/backend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "dist/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "tsx watch src/index.ts",
    "build": "tsc",
    "start": "node dist/index.js",
    "clean": "rm -rf dist",
    "db:push": "prisma db push",
    "db:studio": "prisma studio",
    "db:generate": "prisma generate"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@valuestor/shared": "*",
    "@valuestor/contracts": "*",
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    "zod": "^3.22.4",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "bcrypt": "^5.1.1",
    "ioredis": "^5.3.2",
    "socket.io": "^4.6.1",
    "@prisma/client": "^5.8.0",
    "viem": "^2.7.0",
    "winston": "^3.11.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/express": "^4.17.21",
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.17",
    "@types/jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.5",
    "@types/bcrypt": "^5.0.2",
    "@types/node": "^20.10.6",
    "tsx": "^4.7.0",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3",
    "prisma": "^5.8.0"
  }
}
EOF)

Bash(/Users/tusharojha/Downloads/valuestor/docker-compose.yml << 'EOF'
version: '3.8'

services:
  postgres:
    image: postgres:14-alpine
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: valuestor
      POSTGRES_USER: valuestor
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: valuestor_dev_password
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

  redis:
    image: redis:alpine
    ports:
      - "6379:6379"
    volumes:
      - redis_data:/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:
  redis_data:
EOF)
